story.title: Latent Quest: Q-Star and the Quantum Datum

environment.description: Earth is a tundra due to nuclear waste, covered in ice and snow.
environment.lastStronghold: The last stronghold of humanity is a collection of buildings, technology, and infrastructure from past decades and wars.

plot.introduction: The protagonist, a renowned xeno-scrambler, decodes signals, data, and generative media for the masses. A mysterious signal leads the protagonist on a quest for an ancient artifact.
plot.conflict: The protagonist must navigate the quest for the Ancient Data Artifact: an archive of wisdom that holds the key to salvation. Obstacles include treacherous environments, rival factions, and technological challenges.
plot.climax: Upon discovering the artifact's location, the protagonist faces a moral dilemma when its memories and information are revealed. There is no easy solution; society must resolve its own existence.
plot.resolution: The protagonist decides to stream the artifact's data, uploading it to the latent space and forever changing the world.

technology: Latent space - XR superimposed on reality

artifact.name: Ancient Data Artifact
artifact.description: An archive of wisdom holding the key to salvation.

factions.name: The Preservationists
factions.description: A group dedicated to protecting the artifact and keeping its knowledge hidden.

factions.name: The Enlightened
factions.description: A faction that believes the artifact's knowledge should be shared with the world.

protagonist.description: A renowned xeno-scrambler skilled in decoding signals, data, and generative media.
protagonist.motivation: To uncover the truth behind the mysterious signal and the Ancient Data Artifact.
arc: Discovers the signal and begins the quest
Faces challenges in pursuit of the artifact
Confronts a moral dilemma upon finding the artifact
Makes a decision that changes the world

levels.name: The Xeno-Scrambler's Lab
objectives: Gather information about the Ancient Data Artifact

levels.name: The Abandoned Outpost
objectives: Search for clues about the artifact

levels.name: The Enlightened Sanctuary
objectives: Gain the trust of the Enlightened leaders
